definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Fortunately, there are two bullet casings, know who took part in target practice.
sentences.chinese: 还好，有两个子弹壳，知道自己曾经参加过打靶。

sentences.english: "He loves causing chaos, " a former target-shooting buddy told one reporter.
sentences.chinese: “他热爱造成混乱，”一前打靶一哥们告诉记者。

sentences.english: The trick was coming up with zinc fingers for the specific DNA target.
sentences.chinese: 窍门就是特定DNA打靶的锌指结构。

sentences.english: This improvement is not only greatly superior to OGY method, but also an optimization of targeting in chaotic systems.
sentences.chinese: 在混沌打靶方法的基础上提出了对OGY方法的改进。

sentences.english: The fire is aims at the goal with the guns to hit the target athletics project.
sentences.chinese: 射击是用枪支对准目标打靶的竞技项目。

sentences.english: South Korea brags they used pics of the Norths Family for target practice. So now Kim Jong wants to retaliate…
sentences.chinese: 韩国吹牛说他们使用朝鲜领导人家族的照片来打靶。

sentences.english: At dominic whitford was target practice?
Shooting means the competitive sport of using firearms with the object of hitting a target.
sentences.chinese: 射击是用枪支对准目标打靶的竞技项目。

sentences.english: The only time in life so no more shooting.
sentences.chinese: 人生中唯一一次打靶就这样没了。

sentences.english: A husband who used his semi-naked wife for target practice with an air rifle has been jailed.
sentences.chinese: 利用半裸妻子来做空气枪打靶练习的丈夫已被囚禁。

sentences.english: The paper sets up a quality measurement system of a simulated target for a radio fuze.
sentences.chinese: 研究建立了无线电引信模拟打靶质量检测系统。

sentences.english: They were doing shooting practice in the drilling ground on the hill that year.
sentences.chinese: 当年他们就在山上的演兵场练习打靶。

definition: to fire a gun/to substitute for sb in sitting an examination
to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
to open fire/to shoot a gun
to miss/to shoot and miss the target/off the mark
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
